item.title: Paramount Motion Picture Group President Mike Ireland Exits Studio Amid Skydance Merger
item.description: Mike Ireland, president of Paramount Motion Picture Group, is exiting the studio amid the pending closure of the Paramount-Skydance deal. Studio sources tell Variety that Ireland will stay on in a con
